pages.title: Graviton Particle
pages.text: This is where things get weird. A $(thing)Graviton$() is a synthetic particle that actually warps gravity around it. The recipe sounds almost absurd: a $(item)Nether Star$() at the core, $(item)Phantom Membrane$() for spectral binding, $(item)Diamond$() for structural integrity, and $(item)Inertial Stability Alloy$() to keep it from collapsing in on itself.$(br2)Yields 4 particles per craft. Handle with care.
